climatePledgeFriendly.details: Carbon Neutral Certified by SCS Global Services means the product’s carbon emissions have been measured and reduced, with any remaining emissions offset. Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

body.description: This multi-platform wireless desk keyboard is designed for use with your computer, tablet, and smartphone. The universal keyboard utilizes Bluetooth wireless technology to connect you to a wide variety of devices. Just turn the Easy-Switch dial to switch typing between the connected wireless devices. You'll find a familiar keyboard layout with all the shortcut keys you use the most, and the integrated cradle holds your phone or tablet in place. Wired/Wireless: Wireless; Maximum Wireless Range: 10 ft; Connector/Port/Interface: Bluetooth; For Device Type: Laptop; Smartphone; Tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't work for my phone.
reviews.reviewText: OK I gave this five stars because it's a fantastic keyboard. Just because it doesn't work with my phone doesn't mean I'm going to give it 1 or 2 stars.My iPhone 15 pro max has a case on it and won't fit in the stand. Immediately that's a deal breaker for me. I'm not taking the case off to type. But..The keyboard looks and feels solid. It's not compact. The keys have a solid click to them and it connected to my phone instantly. If you can work around your phone or tablet having a case this is 5 stars all around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've been waiting
reviews.reviewText: I love this keyboard, OMG. It works great with my Surface 3, IPad Mini and my Lg G4 cell phone. The instructions are actually on the keyboard with the website address. I just noticed it now as I type this review using the keyboard. I've had the keyboard for almost 2 weeks and use daily throughout the day. I simply Google Logitech K480 keyboard manual and it pulled. Changing from one device is as easy as turning the dial and the surface fits perfectly in cradle. My iPad has an Otterbox Defender case, so of course it does not fit in the cradle. Soon my Surface will not fit the cradle because it too will have an Otterbox or some type for glove fitting case. Also the phone fits with or without is glove fitting case. I cannot comment on the range because my eyes cannot see small print from 30 feet; basically, my device and the keyboard and always together. There is a battery life indicator, but not exactly sure where its located.When switching devices there are no delays as I expected. The dial is easily turned so if its not working then check the dial; I usually find that is my issue. Other then that I have not has any issues.

reviews.reviewerName: Buenas medias tal y cómo se veian en la descripción.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Funcionaba perfectamente pero la caja estaba abierta
reviews.reviewText: Buen producto, funciona bien solo que parecía que había sido usado (renewed) y cuando lo compre no lo mencionaba.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2022
Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY REFURBISHED
reviews.reviewText: It worked literally for about three minutes. It’s absolute garbage and I’m livid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bluetooth keyboard ever
reviews.reviewText: It works great, and I have used it just like a regular keyboard. It has some special function buttons. The only that that would make it better is if it had a trackball built in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great keyboard but a little heavy and large.
reviews.reviewText: I am still using this keyboard. I've owned it since April 2015. Originally I complained about connectivity. But since then I have had few issues. This keyboard keeps itself asleep to preserve battery life. When you start typing it will remember what you press and push it through once it reconnects.It's slightly heavy, but the battery life and ability to switch things is worth it. This is my favorite switcheroo keyboard.Original Review: Excellent keyboard featuring the three-way trading between different bluetooth devices.Though the keyboard works great when connected, connecting it and keeping it connected is a challenge that meets me almost every time I pull this thing out.Purchased from Best Buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Connection with device is spotty at best. Also has typing lag.
